aircraft.value: Wasp Interceptor - AC-2735-271 at Sector South Station

defect_observed.value: Fuel nozzle blockage. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Compressor Section component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

remarks_investigation.value: Detailed examination conducted. Corrective measures implemented.

remarks_design.value: Investigation findings reviewed. Root cause analysis is acceptable. Recommend implementation of proposed corrective actions. Date: 04/10/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Gp Capt V.S. Pillai

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Component inspection records verified. All quality parameters were within acceptable limits during manufacturing. Date: 07/10/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Operational usage reviewed. Component operated within prescribed limits. Concur with investigation outcome. Date: 08/10/2023 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 09/10/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design authority review completed. Recommend continued airworthiness monitoring of affected component type. Date: 14/10/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

ii. Preventive Action: Implement condition-based monitoring system
